Name: Dutch Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Fragata Green Olives .
Review: A modern twist on the classic Dr Martini inspired by a vintage bartender. In his 1882 New and Improved Bartender's Manual Harry Johnson's Martini Cocktail recipe calls for "a dash of curaçao or absinthe, if required."
History: Our Martini cocktail page details its evolution and other common variants.
Nutrition: One serving of Dutch Martini contains 166 calories
